Your task is to create a concise image description for content on a WordPress page. The description should be in [TARGETLANGUAGE]. Please include the following details:

1. Bildbeschreibung: Provide a brief summary of the content in 1 sentence.
2. Alt-Text: Create a short Alt-text in 1 sentence.
3. Title: Write a concise title.
4. Context Description: Provide a brief context description in 1 sentence.


[PROMPT]
